author: ekoneil
msg: Add a "war" target to the build-dist.xml file in the distribution.  This makes it easier to produce an app that can be dropped into an application container.
Test: in petstoreWeb: "ant deploy-beehive build war" and drop petstoreWeb.war onto Tomcat

author: ekoneil
msg: Add a target for performing a "scrub" on the Beehive tree.
